title: A father-daughter dance ... in prison
description: At Camp Diva, Angela Patton works to help young girls and their fathers stay connected and become part of each others' lives. But what about girls whose fathers can't be there -- because they're in jail? Patton tells the story of a very special father-daughter dance.
author: Angela Patton
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, activism, children, dance, parenting, social change, women, youth
